name: Nibly
overview: A Worm\Snake\Nibbler game for one person created in 1984 by G. Reimuth & U. Schönewolf and released in Courbois Software #6420, Digital Marketing PD #098 and in Italy in Super Game 2000 N°03 (Aprile 1985), Top 30 N°2. Eat the dots without snacking on your own tail, but the more you eat, the longer you get!
